module.name: codepagescommon
module.short: Contains Unicode conversion tables for common code pages.

descr.p: codepagescommon.pas is part of the LazUtils package.

element.name: TCharToUTF8Table
element.short: Array type which provides indexed access to UTF-8 codepoint pointers.

element.name: ArrayISO_8859_1ToUTF8
element.short: Provides a mapping for ISO-8859-1 characters to UTF-8 codepoints.

element.short: Provides a mapping for ISO-8859-9 characters to UTF-8 codepoints.
